title: Does LoL take fan suggestions for stories?
body: I was curious as I'm extremely new to the boards. I'm a recent college graduate with a minor in screenwriting and I really love Tristana as a character. I'd love to expand her very limited lore and her story, or at least make a suggestion if Riot likes that kinda thing. If not that's fine. Just asking the community overall

replies.body:
Hello there!

Generally Riot doesn't request story pitches or writing from players - usually the way is to apply to work here, or to take part in things like the Polycount contest (though that was a wee while ago).

https://www.riotgames.com/en/work-with-us/disciplines/narrative

https://polycount.com/discussion/198871/riot-creative-contest-2017-winners-narrative

Nah more like "we already have people that do this for us so we don't need the community to do it."

Just a salty Shyvana main who's mad. Nothing to see here. Move along.
Thought you were gonna make use of that "No fan suggestions allowed" legal clause (which I personally think is bullshit).
